channel.title: e2fs on LuyangのBlog

item.title: e2fsprogs-1.42.8 源码编译安装
item.description: tar xvf e2fsprogs-1.42.8.tar.gz cd e2fsprogs-1.42.8 mkdir build cd build/ ../configure make sudo make install 问题： ubuntu20.04 编译报错 undefined reference to 'makedev' 解决方法: vim <path-to-e2fsprogs-1.42.8>/lib/blkid/devname.c 添加头文件 #include <sys/sysmacros.h
